bibliothek.gui.dock.common.theme

Class CBasicTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • bibliothek.gui.dock.common.theme.CDockTheme<BasicTheme>
      • bibliothek.gui.dock.common.theme.CBasicTheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DockTheme

    @ClientOnly
public class CBasicTheme
extends CDockTheme<BasicTheme>
    A bridge between a BasicTheme and the common-project.
    Author:
    Benjamin Sigg

        public CBasicTheme(CControl control)

        Parameters:

        public void uninstall(DockController controller)
        Description copied from interface: DockTheme
